name: Dark Lovers - Extended Edition
description:
WARNING
This game has trigger warning for suicide and other heavy themes.

SYNOPSIS
You control a 15 year old girl named Clementine, who wasn't invited by anyone for the prom that happens tonight. You may choose your own path to see how your night ends.

BACKGROUND
Dark Lovers is a visual novel game developed in Ren'Py software. The game can be played by only using your mouse.

FEATURES
~30 mins Gameplay
5 Endings
2 Rare Events
1 Extra Scene
4 Characters to Interact With
